description: This file implements the 'HttpAtoFxCat1' object for HTTP protocol processing, specifically managing atom tables for HTTP CGI variables and mappings between atom names and codes. It includes functions to create code and name tables, retrieve atom codes by name, and retrieve atom names by code.

classes.name: HTTP_ATO_FXCAT1_OBJECT
classes.description: Object managing atom tables for HTTP CGI environment variables, supporting creation and lookup operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoFxCat1CreateCodeTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Creates the atom code table for HTTP CGI variables, populating it with data from global arrays.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoFxCat1CreateNameTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Creates the atom name table; currently a placeholder that always succeeds.

methods.name: ULONG HttpAtoFxCat1GetAtomCode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * name)
methods.description: Retrieves the atom code for a given name by looking up the atom descriptor.

methods.name: char * HttpAtoFxCat1GetAtomName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG code)
methods.description: Retrieves the atom name for a given code by looking up the atom descriptor.
